subject: Amazon Order
description_text:
I have an amazon order:containin haptic pedal motors and a control box. I
received the haptic pedal motors but no control box. I realize they may
come separately, the issue is I have no way to track the control box thru
amazon. Can you guys get back to me with tracking for the control box?

113-0356996-4793810

[image: image.png]

conversations.body_text: Hi Nathan Brown,  The tracking number for the control box is: JSEGK0926080622YQ (ships from China warehouse, the shipping carrier is JSEXPRESS, you can track it via https://www.js-exp.com/EN/index.php?page=19)

That tracking number or website doesn't seem to work. The page doesn't
actually update with a status. After clicking 'query', nothing happens.
I've tried from other browsers.

If you could just get me an ETA, that would be great!

[image: image.png]

On Thu, Jul 17, 2025 at 4:24â€¯AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Nathan Brown,    As soon as our operations team prints the shipping label, I provide it to you right away. However, it usually takes one to two days for the logistics company to pick up the package and update the tracking information.
